Class PeriodicSampler

source code

Takes samples at regular intervals.

Method Details

__init__(self, adc, sensors, timer, period, handler)
(Constructor)

source code 

Initialise sampler.

The first sample will be taken after one period has elapsed.

Parameters:
  • adc - ADC to sample with.
  • sensors - List of Sensors to sample.
  • timer - Timer or VirtualTimerto use for timing.
  • period - Interval between samples.
  • handler - Function to call on each sample. The sampled values will be passed as arguments in the same order as the list of sensors passed to this constructor.
Overrides: object.__init__
